mapper.select: /* 대국민포털_권한기본 조회 (AuthrtMapper.getAuthrt) */ SELECT authrt_cd ,up_authrt_cd ,task_se_cd ,authrt_nm ,authrt_type ,authrt_expln ,use_yn ,wrtr_dept_nm ,mdfr_dept_nm ,rgtr_id ,reg_dt ,reg_prgrm_id ,mdfr_id ,mdfcn_dt ,mdfcn_prgrm_id FROM "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_AUTHRT" WHERE 1=1 AND authrt_cd = #{authrtCd}
mapper.update: /* 대국민포털_권한기본 수정 (AuthrtMapper.updateAuthrt) */ UPDATE "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_AUTHRT" SET up_authrt_cd = coalesce(#{upAuthrtCd}, up_authrt_cd) ,task_se_cd = coalesce(#{taskSeCd}, task_se_cd) ,authrt_nm = coalesce(#{authrtNm}, authrt_nm) ,authrt_type = coalesce(#{authrtType}, authrt_type) ,authrt_expln = coalesce(#{authrtExpln}, authrt_expln) ,use_yn = coalesce(#{useYn}, use_yn) ,wrtr_dept_nm = coalesce(#{wrtrDeptNm}, wrtr_dept_nm) ,mdfr_dept_nm = coalesce(#{mdfrDeptNm}, mdfr_dept_nm) ,mdfr_id = coalesce(#{mdfrId}, mdfr_id) ,mdfcn_dt = now() ,mdfcn_prgrm_id = coalesce(#{mdfcnPrgrmId}, mdfcn_prgrm_id) WHERE 1=1 AND authrt_cd = #{authrtCd}
